```r
# install.packages(c("cobrar","jsonlite"))
library(cobrar)
```
## Load the demo model
```r
f <- system.file("extdata","e_coli_core.xml", package="cobrar")
stopifnot(file.exists(f))
mod <- readSBMLmod(f)
```
## Run FROG
```r
res <- frog_run(mod,
                obj_rxn  = "BIOMASS_Ecoli_core_w_GAM",
                sense    = "max",
                fva_frac = 1.0,
                ko_threads = 1)
```
## Inspect results
```r
head(res$fba); head(res$fva)
head(res$reaction_deletion); head(res$gene_deletion)
res$objective_checks
```
## Export a portable FROG report
```r
frog_export(res, out_dir = "FROG_report", make_omex = TRUE)
# Creates FROG_report/ with CSVs + frog.json and FROG.omex one level above.
```
